questions.question: What is the predominant color of the shoe's upper?
What is the secondary color prominently featured on the shoe?

What is the overall shape of the shoe's toe box?

What is the appearance of the heel pull tab, located at the back?
What is the brand name subtly printed on the side of the shoe?

What is the color of the accent stripe near the heel?
What appears to be the primary material of the shoe's sole?
What is the visible texture of the area where the midsole meets the outsole?
What is the overall condition of the shoe, visually apparent?
